content: free pattern download in **english** 1 and **danish** 2 only --------------------- **yarn usage** * xs cosy 600 g soft bamboo fine 350 g * s cosy 650 g soft bamboo fine 350 g * m cosy 700 g soft bamboo fine 400 g * l cosy 750 g soft bamboo fine 400 g * xl cosy 800 g soft bamboo fine 450 g * xxl cosy 850 g soft bamboo fine 450 g **materiales** * circular needles 3 5 mm and 5 0 mm * double pointed needles 3 0 mm **gauge** 17 sts x 23 r in stocking st on 5 0 mm = 10 x 10 cm *the given amounts of yarn are for guidance only * **abbreviations and definitions** st s stitch es round round s n needle s k knit p purl rs right side - k all sts ws wrong side - p all sts edge st edge stitch - knit first and last st in every row k2tog decrease -knit 2 sts together through back loops in the beginning knit 2 sts toghether in the end m1b increase - from the back lift loop between sts with left needle knit into front st indicates number of sts on the n for the 6 sizes \* \* the instructions shown between these stars must be repeated for the whole round/row or with the number indicated after x **guide** knit bottom up on circular needles up to where the pocket starts the pocket is worked back and forth while the rest of the work is on hold when the pocket is done put it on hold and work the rest to the height of the pocket the front piece is knit together with the pocket - continue working up to the armholes divide in back and front piece finish the parts separately sew the shoulders together and pick up sts for the hood work the arms back and forth and sew them on 1 https //gohandmade net/shop/263-clothing/6001-hoodie-xs---xxl---uk/ 2 https //gohandmade net/shop/256-clothing/5998-hoodie-xs---xxl---dk/
